languages.text: "Но если я выполняю миссию, то проигнорирую любой отвлекающий фактор. Потому что задачи Арбитес стоят выше банальных преступлений — мы собираем десятину, что питает военную мощь Империума и обеспечивает его власть на мирах. Размениваться на мелочи значит преступно пренебрегать временем и ресурсами, которые нам даны для служения абсолюту закона".

"However, if I have an assignment to carry out, I will ignore any distracting factors. The duties of the Arbites are above everyday crime: we collect the tithe that feeds the military might of the Imperium and sustains its authority over many worlds. To be bogged down in trivialities is to commit a criminal waste of time and resources that have been granted to us to serve the absolute of the law."
languages.original_text: "Но если я выполняю миссию, то проигнорирую любой отвлекающий фактор. Потому что задачи Арбитес стоят выше банальных преступлений — мы собираем десятину, что питает военную мощь Империума и обеспечивает его власть на мирах. Размениваться на мелочи значит преступно пренебрегать временем и ресурсами, которые нам даны для служения абсолюту закона".

We collect the tithe that feeds the military might of the Imperium and sustains its authority over the many worlds — to be bogged down in trivialities is to commit a criminal waste of the time and resources that have been granted to us to serve the absolute of the law."

languages.text: 「しかし、任務がある場合、気を散らすような要素は一切無視します。高等裁定局の職務は日常的な犯罪の上位にあります。私たちは帝国の軍事力を支える租税を徴収し、無数の惑星に対するその支配権を維持するために働いています。些末な事柄に足を取られることは、法の絶対性に奉仕するために与えられた時間と資源を、犯罪的なまでに無駄にすることに等しいです」
languages.original_text: "However, if I have an assignment to carry out, I will ignore any distracting factors. The duties of the Arbites are above everyday crime: we collect the tithe that feeds the military might of the Imperium and sustains its authority over many worlds. To be bogged down in trivialities is to commit a criminal waste of time and resources that have been granted to us to serve the absolute of the law."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、任務がある場合、気を散らすような要素は一切無視します。高等裁定局の職務は日常的な犯罪の上位にあります。私たちは帝国の軍事力を支える租税を徴収し、無数の惑星に対するその支配権を維持するために働いています。些末な事柄に足を取られることは、法の絶対性に奉仕するために与えられた時間と資源を、犯罪的なまでに無駄にすることに等しいです」
「しかし、任務がある場合、気を散らすような要素は一切無視します。高等裁定局の職務は日常的な犯罪の上位にあります。私たちは帝国の軍事力を支える租税を徴収し、無数の惑星に対するその支配権を維持するために働いています。些末な事柄に足を取られることは、法の絶対性に奉仕するために与えられた時間と資源を、犯罪的なまでに無駄にすることに等しいです」

languages.text: "Bin ich allerdings gerade mit einem Auftrag befasst, ignoriere ich sämtliche ablenkenden Faktoren. Die Pflichten der Arbites stehen über alltäglichen Verbrechen: Wir sammeln den Zehnt ein, der die militärische Macht des Imperiums sichert und die Autorität über viele Welten aufrechterhält. Von Trivialitäten ausgebremst zu werden, ist eine in sich kriminelle Verschwendung von Zeit und Ressourcen, die uns gewährt wurden, um dem Gesetz zu dienen."
languages.original_text: "However, if I have an assignment to carry out, I will ignore any distracting factors. The duties of the Arbites are above everyday crime: we collect the tithe that feeds the military might of the Imperium and sustains its authority over many worlds. To be bogged down in trivialities is to commit a criminal waste of time and resources that have been granted to us to serve the absolute of the law."

traits.locale_text: "Bin ich allerdings gerade mit einem Auftrag befasst, ignoriere ich sämtliche ablenkenden Faktoren. Die Pflichten der Arbites stehen über alltäglichen Verbrechen: Wir sammeln den Zehnt ein, der die militärische Macht des Imperiums sichert und die Autorität über viele Welten aufrechterhält. Von Trivialitäten ausgebremst zu werden, ist eine in sich kriminelle Verschwendung von Zeit und Ressourcen, die uns gewährt wurden, um dem Gesetz zu dienen."

languages.text: « Cependant, si je suis déjà chargé d'une autre mission, je me dois d'ignorer celle-ci afin d'éviter toute distraction pouvant nuire à la bonne complétion de la première. Les devoirs de l'Arbites transcendent les crimes ordinaires : nous sommes chargés de la collecte de la dîme qui entretient la puissance militaire de l'Imperium et assure le maintien de l'autorité sur d'innombrables planètes. S'abaisser à la gestion de troubles aussi triviaux serait un gaspillage criminel du temps et des ressources qui nous ont été octroyés afin de servir Sa loi absolue. »
languages.original_text: "However, if I have an assignment to carry out, I will ignore any distracting factors. The duties of the Arbites are above everyday crime: we collect the tithe that feeds the military might of the Imperium and sustains its authority over many worlds. To be bogged down in trivialities is to commit a criminal waste of time and resources that have been granted to us to serve the absolute of the law."

traits.locale_text: « Cependant, si je suis déjà chargé d'une autre mission, je me dois d'ignorer celle-ci afin d'éviter toute distraction pouvant nuire à la bonne complétion de la première. Les devoirs de l'Arbites transcendent les crimes ordinaires : nous sommes chargés de la collecte de la dîme qui entretient la puissance militaire de l'Imperium et assure le maintien de l'autorité sur d'innombrables planètes. S'abaisser à la gestion de troubles aussi triviaux serait un gaspillage criminel du temps et des ressources qui nous ont été octroyés afin de servir Sa loi absolue. »

« Cependant, si je suis déjà chargé d'une autre mission, je me dois d'ignorer celle-ci afin d'éviter toute distraction pouvant nuire à la bonne complétion de la première. Les devoirs de l'Arbites transcendent les crimes ordinaires : nous sommes chargés de la collecte de la dîme qui entretient la puissance militaire de l'Imperium et assure le maintien de l'autorité sur d'innombrables planètes. S'abaisser à la gestion de troubles aussi triviaux serait un gaspillage criminel du temps et des ressources qui nous ont été octroyés afin de servir Sa loi absolue. »

languages.text: «No obstante, si tengo una misión que cumplir, ignoraré cualquier factor que me distraiga de ella. Los deberes del Arbites están por encima de los delitos cotidianos: recaudamos el diezmo que alimenta a las fuerzas armadas del Imperium y sustenta su autoridad sobre sus numerosos mundos. Demorarme con nimiedades equivale a cometer un despilfarro criminal del tiempo y los recursos que me han sido concedidos a fin de imponer la ley de formas más absolutas».
languages.original_text: "However, if I have an assignment to carry out, I will ignore any distracting factors. The duties of the Arbites are above everyday crime: we collect the tithe that feeds the military might of the Imperium and sustains its authority over many worlds. To be bogged down in trivialities is to commit a criminal waste of time and resources that have been granted to us to serve the absolute of the law."

traits.locale_text: «No obstante, si tengo una misión que cumplir, ignoraré cualquier factor que me distraiga de ella. Los deberes del Arbites están por encima de los delitos cotidianos: recaudamos el diezmo que alimenta a las fuerzas armadas del Imperium y sustenta su autoridad sobre sus numerosos mundos. Demorarme con nimiedades equivale a cometer un despilfarro criminal del tiempo y los recursos que me han sido concedidos a fin de imponer la ley de formas más absolutas».

languages.text: “不过，如果我还有其他任务在身，我会忽略一切干扰要素。帝国法务部要处理的事情，比处理日常犯罪重要得多。我们负责征收什一税，正是我们征收来的资源，成为了帝国军事力量的支柱，维持着帝国在众多世界中的权威。若是把精力放在琐事上，这种行为无异于犯罪。这相当于在浪费我们的时间与资源，让我们无法为祂的绝对律法服务。”
languages.original_text: "However, if I have an assignment to carry out, I will ignore any distracting factors. The duties of the Arbites are above everyday crime: we collect the tithe that feeds the military might of the Imperium and sustains its authority over many worlds. To be bogged down in trivialities is to commit a criminal waste of time and resources that have been granted to us to serve the absolute of the law."

traits.locale_text: “不过，如果我还有其他任务在身，我会忽略一切干扰要素。帝国法务部要处理的事情，比处理日常犯罪重要得多。我们负责征收什一税，正是我们征收来的资源，成为了帝国军事力量的支柱，维持着帝国在众多世界中的权威。若是把精力放在琐事上，这种行为无异于犯罪。这相当于在浪费我们的时间与资源，让我们无法为祂的绝对律法服务。”

languages.text: "Ancak yerine getirmem gereken bir görevim varsa dikkat dağıtıcı etmenleri gözüm görmez. Arbites vazifeleri, günlük suçların üzerindedir. İmparatorluk'un askerî gücünü besleyen ve pek çok dünya üzerindeki otoritesini sürdüren aşarı toplarız. Önemsiz şeylerle boğulmak, kanunun mutlaklığına hizmet etmek için bize verilen zaman ve kaynakların suç teşkil eden bir israfıdır."
languages.original_text: "However, if I have an assignment to carry out, I will ignore any distracting factors. The duties of the Arbites are above everyday crime: we collect the tithe that feeds the military might of the Imperium and sustains its authority over many worlds. To be bogged down in trivialities is to commit a criminal waste of time and resources that have been granted to us to serve the absolute of the law."

traits.locale_text: "Ancak yerine getirmem gereken bir görevim varsa dikkat dağıtıcı etmenleri gözüm görmez. Arbites vazifeleri, günlük suçların üzerindedir. İmparatorluk'un askerî gücünü besleyen ve pek çok dünya üzerindeki otoritesini sürdüren aşarı toplarız. Önemsiz şeylerle boğulmak, kanunun mutlaklığına hizmet etmek için bize verilen zaman ve kaynakların suç teşkil eden bir israfıdır."

"Ancak yerine getirmem gereken bir görevim varsa dikkat dağıtıcı etmenleri gözüm görmez. Arbites'in görevleri, günlük suçların üzerindedir. İmparatorluk'un askerî gücünü besleyen ve sahibi olduğu pek çok dünya üzerindeki otoritesini sürdüren aşarı toplarız. Önemsiz şeylerle boğulmak, kanunun mutlaklığına hizmet etmek için bize verilen zaman ve kaynakların suç teşkil eden bir israfıdır."

languages.original_text: "However, if I have an assignment to carry out, I will ignore any distracting factors. To be bogged down in trivialities is to commit a criminal waste of the time and resources that have been granted to us to serve the absolute of the law."
